sewer_hideout.name: Sewer Hideout
sewer_hideout.desc: A damp, dim hideout beneath the city.

city_streets.name: City Streets
city_streets.desc: Busy streets with vendors and danger.

underground_tunnel.name: Underground Tunnel
underground_tunnel.desc: A narrow tunnel that connects the undercity.

abandoned_station.name: Abandoned Station
abandoned_station.desc: An old transit station, half-collapsed and eerily quiet.

riverside_dock.name: Riverside Dock
riverside_dock.desc: A muddy dock by the river where supplies sometimes wash ashore.

black_market.name: Black Market
black_market.desc: A shadowy market where questionable goods change hands.

apple.name: Apple
apple.desc: A small red apple. Restores satiety.

bread.name: Bread
bread.desc: A piece of dry bread. Slightly fills hunger.

canned_beans.name: Canned Beans
canned_beans.desc: A can of beans. Very filling.

soup.name: Soup
soup.desc: A warm soup. Comforting and filling.

medkit.name: Medkit
medkit.desc: A medical kit. Restores a lot of health.

coffee.name: Coffee
coffee.desc: A bitter drink. Restores some sanity.

npc.none: No one seems to be here.

mara.name: Mara the Fixer
mara.afternoon_black_market: In the half-lit alleys of the market, Mara casually asks what you’re looking for, hinting she can move almost anything—if your goods are interesting enough.
mara.night_black_market: Under the cover of night, Mara’s tone turns sharper; she warns you that people who show up empty-handed rarely get a second chance here.

old_thom.name: Old Thom
old_thom.morning_dock: Old Thom nods toward the river, muttering about fresh crates drifting in with the morning current and telling you to keep your eyes open.
old_thom.evening_dock: As the light fades, Old Thom warns you that once it’s dark, the dock belongs more to raiders than scavengers.

sister_hana.name: Sister Hana
sister_hana.day_streets: Sister Hana stops you on the street, offering a brief prayer and a reminder that even in this city, there are still people worth trusting.
sister_hana.evening_sewer: Finding you back in the hideout, Sister Hana sits for a moment, asking softly if the city felt heavier today than yesterday.

rat_king.name: The Rat King
rat_king.night_tunnel: From a corner of the tunnel, the Rat King whispers about shifting patrol routes, trading secrets for a glint of metal in your hand.
rat_king.dawn_tunnel: At the edge of dawn, the Rat King seems restless, hinting that something big is moving aboveground and urging you to stay below a little longer.

station_doctor.name: Station Doctor
station_doctor.day_station: The Station Doctor eyes your wounds with a professional frown, advising you to clean them properly before the rust and dust sink deeper.
station_doctor.night_station: With tired eyes, the Station Doctor tells you he’s patched up too many people today and suggests you avoid adding to that number tonight.

scavenge.found_generic: You found something useful among the scraps.

action.rest: You take a moment to rest and recover your strength.
action.trade: You browse the market stalls, looking for a good deal.
